run this exact command in a terminal.     sudo cp /usr/share/pixmaps/gnome-logo-icon-transparent.png /usr/share/pixmaps/gnome-logo-icon-transparent.png.bak && sudo cp /usr/share/icons/hicolor/24x24/apps/tomboy.png /usr/share/pixmaps/gnome-logo-icon-transparent.png
then run this command       gnome-panel --replace
then run this command       killall gnome-panel
ok are you using the default icon set?
